: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus pulled his daughter up so she was right between him and Nightlight. He hugged his beloved family close.
Rodimus Prime: Elita it is then. She seems to like it.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:ngihtlight :

Nightlight smiled and looked at her baby, it was a beauty baby, her 
beast forms eyes are golden, and her fur had the color of lioness's 
fur, her sablethoot's fangs weren't all develovep but they started 
to show. Her little nose was pink and he had a shot tail.

"No"replied Nightlight with a smile"I would rather Elita..."isn't 
it, Elita?"

Tha baby gigling when she heard the name nuzzled against her mommy.

wrote:

> : : Rodimus Prime : :

Nightlight to answer her.
> Rodimus Prime: Only if you like it too. Do you still want it to be 
Arcee?
